summary: Completed backend testing for Yacco EMR Ghana Healthcare Platform regions API. All 4 specified region endpoints are working correctly on localhost:8001.

platform_issues.issue: External preview URL not routing /api calls
platform_issues.note: This is a platform routing issue, not a code issue

passed_tests: Backend Health Check - GET /api/health returns healthy status
GET /api/regions/ - Returns all 16 Ghana regions with correct structure
GET /api/regions/{region_id} - Returns specific region details for Greater Accra
GET /api/regions/greater-accra/hospitals - Returns facilities structure for region
action_item_for_main_agent: External preview URL routing needs to be fixed to proxy /api calls to backend port 8001. Code is working correctly.
